import React, { useState } from 'react' import './infoCard.css' import {UilPen} from '@iconscout/react-unicons' import ProfileModal from '../profileModal/ProfileModal' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' const InfoCard = () => { const [modalOpen,setModalOpen]= useState(false) const dispatch = useDispatch() const params = useParams() const {user} = useSelector((state)=>state.authReducer.authData) const profileUserId = params.id const[profileUser,setProfileUser] = useState() return (

Your Info

setModalOpen(true)}/>
Status {user.relationship}
Lives in {user.livesIn}
Works at {user.worksAt}
) } export default InfoCard
